meanings.sent1: The cake was marvy with its delicious frosting.
meanings.sent2: She received a marvy gift for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The marvy sunset painted the sky in beautiful colors.
meanings.sent4: The marvy performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The marvy view from the mountaintop took her breath away.

meanings.definition: A feeling of excitement or enthusiasm
meanings.sent1: His face lit up with marvy when he saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: The crowd erupted with marvy at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The marvy of winning the game was contagious.
meanings.sent4: Her heart danced with marvy as she opened the acceptance letter.
meanings.sent5: The marvy in the air was palpable as they awaited the results.
